concept.title: Installing the HTTP Module for tc Server
concept.shortdesc: This topic describes how to install the HTTP session management module with tc Server templates.

ol.li: If you do not already have tc Server, download and install the product from the VMware tc Server download page or the Pivotal tc Server download page. These instructions require tc Server 2.5 or later.

li.p: The HTTP Session Management Module for tc Server is included in the installation package. After you install , you will find the module in the tools/Modules directory of the installation.

ol.li: Unzip the module into the Pivotal tc Server $CATALINA_HOME/templates directory so that it creates geode-p2p and geode-cs subdirectories within the tc Server templates directory.

Copy these jar files from the Geode distribution lib directory to the lib directory of your tc server (<instance>/lib):
antlr jar
fastutil jar
geode-core jar
javax.transaction-api jar
jgroups jar
log4j-api jar
log4j-core jar
log4j-jul jar
